Statute.Title: Statute Law (Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms) Amendment Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Modification législative (Charte canadienne des droits et libertés), Loi de)

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., c. 31 (1st Supp.), ss. 93 and 94 proclaimed in force 13.08.85 see SI/85‑153; ss. 1 to 6, 8 to 41, 62 to 92 and 95 to 106 proclaimed in force 15.10.85 see SI/85‑188; s. 7 proclaimed in force 13.08.86 see SI/86‑171; Part III (ss. 42 to 61) proclaimed in force 02.10.86 see SI/86‑192
